mapper.select: select u.id, u.account, u.truename, u.icon, u.gender, u.nickname, u.introduction, u.fellowship, ua.activityID from dcd_user u, dcd_user_activity ua where u.account = ua.account and ua.activityID = #{activityID} and not exists ( select u.id, u.account, u.truename, u.icon, u.gender, u.nickname, u.introduction, u.fellowship, uac.activityID from dcd_user u, dcd_user_activity_clock uac where datediff(uac.gmtCreate, NOW()) = 0 and u.account = uac.account and uac.activityID = #{activityID} and u.account = ua.account )
